about.title: About Shekhabo
about.subtitle: Shekhabo is an EdTech platform for job seekers and graduates who want more than just theory. We connect you with top industry experts who teach you the skills, hacks, and strategies that companies actually look for. Our promise is simple: Learn what you missed. Master what you need. Step confidently into your career.

ourStory.title: Our Story
ourStory.intro: When you truly understand your work, you succeed faster, feel more confident, and build a career you can be proud of. This is the transformation we enable through our platform.
ourStory.rippleEffect: Our approach creates a ripple effect of positive change:

forLearners.title: For Learners
forLearners.description: Genuine confidence and competence that comes from truly mastering skills rather than just memorizing theory. Faster career progression and job satisfaction.

forEmployers.title: For Employers
forEmployers.description: Job-ready professionals who can contribute immediately, reducing training time and costs while increasing overall productivity.

forSociety.title: For Society
forSociety.description: A more skilled workforce that drives innovation and economic growth, with individuals who are genuinely prepared for the modern workplace.

forEducation.title: For Education
forEducation.description: A complementary approach that bridges the gap between academic learning and practical application, making education more meaningful and effective.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description: We're not here to replace universities. We're here to complete what they started — to make sure people don't just pass courses, but master them. We bridge the gap between education and employment by focusing on what learners actually need in their specific careers.

vision.title: Our Vision
vision.description: A world where every graduate feels confident and prepared for their career. Where the transition from education to employment is seamless, and where people can build careers they can be truly proud of through genuine understanding and mastery of their field.

different.title: How We're Different
different.subtitle: We don't just teach courses — we complete the learning journey. Here's what sets us apart:

needBased.title: Need-Based Learning
needBased.description: Instead of one-size-fits-all curricula, we focus on what learners actually need in their specific career paths.

professionals.title: Industry Professionals
professionals.description: Our instructors are professionals who have actually worked in the field, bringing real experience and insider knowledge.

actionOriented.title: Action-Oriented
actionOriented.description: Less theory, more action. Learners work on tasks they would actually face in their jobs, building practical competency.

noOneLeft.title: No One Left Behind
noOneLeft.description: Our step-by-step guidance ensures every learner understands before moving on, building confidence with each step.

realWorld.title: Real-World Focus
realWorld.description: We believe in practical learning over theoretical memorization. Every lesson is designed around actual workplace scenarios and real challenges that learners will face in their careers.

personalized.title: Personalized Guidance
personalized.description: We understand that every learner is unique. Our approach identifies individual weaknesses and strengths, providing targeted support where it's needed most.

expertMentorship.title: Expert Mentorship
expertMentorship.description: Our instructors aren't just teachers — they're professionals who have lived the experience. They bring insider knowledge and real-world insights that textbooks can't provide.

confidenceBuilding.title: Confidence Building
confidenceBuilding.description: We believe that true understanding breeds confidence. When you genuinely master your skills, you don't just get a job — you excel in your career and build something meaningful.

problem.title: The Problem We Identified
problem.subtitle: This isn't because they're lazy. It's because the education system wasn't built to match the demands of the workplace.

theoryOverPractice.title: Theory Over Practice
theoryOverPractice.description: Students memorize enough to pass exams, but never really understand the subject or how to apply knowledge in real-world situations.

missingGuidance.title: Missing Guidance
missingGuidance.description: They skip practical projects because no one guides them properly, leaving crucial hands-on experience gaps that employers expect.

workplaceGap.title: Workplace Reality Gap
workplaceGap.description: Teaching focuses too much on theory and not enough on real-world application, leaving graduates unprepared for actual job demands.

impact.title: The Real Impact
impact.result: The result? Stress, frustration, lack of confidence, and slow career growth. And for companies, this means lower productivity and more time spent on training.
impact.gap: We saw talented individuals struggling not because they lacked potential, but because there was a fundamental gap between what they learned and what they needed to succeed in their careers.
impact.betterWay: We believe there's a better way.

solution.title: Our Solution
solution.subtitle: That's why we created Shekhabo.com — a platform designed to fill the gap between education and employment. We focus on what learners actually need in their specific careers, not just what's in a textbook.

personalizedLearning.title: Personalized Learning
personalizedLearning.description: Students identify exactly where they feel weak, and we match them with targeted lessons that address their specific needs and career goals.

expertInstructors.title: Expert Instructors
expertInstructors.description: Professionals who have actually worked in the field, teaching real-world skills and insider tips that you won't find in traditional textbooks.

practicalApproach.title: Practical Approach
practicalApproach.description: Less theory, more action. Learners work on tasks they would actually face in a job, building genuine workplace competency and confidence.

stepByStep.title: Step-by-Step Guidance
stepByStep.description: No one is left behind. Our instructors ensure every learner understands before moving on, building confidence with every step of the journey.

toLearners.title: To Our Learners
toLearners.description: We promise to provide practical, job-relevant skills taught by industry experts. We're committed to ensuring you don't just pass courses, but truly master the skills you need for career success.

toPartners.title: To Our Partners
toPartners.description: We work collaboratively with educational institutions and employers to create a more effective learning ecosystem that benefits everyone in the education-to-employment pipeline.
